channel.title: UniversalMailer's Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 3.0 build 11 (1 bug fixed, 1 new feature)
item.description:
New features

  • You can now either specify a CSS for the entire email body or a inline style for the containing
    tag.

Bug fixing

  • fixed an issue that removed line breaks on text only emails
